alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 1:08AM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches 6000 to 8000 feet, and 1 to 2 feet above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highway 168 across Westgard Pass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas could see reduced visibility due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
